member.name: IMFRemoteProxy.GetRemoteHost
member.summary: Retrieves a pointer to the object that is hosting this proxy.
member.param: Interface identifier (IID) of the requested interface.
Receives a pointer to the requested interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFRemoteProxy.GetRemoteObject
member.summary: Retrieves a pointer to the remote object for which this object is a proxy.
member.param: Interface identifier (IID) of the requested interface.
Receives a pointer to the requested interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFRemoteProxy
member.summary: Exposed by objects that act as a proxy for a remote object. To obtain a pointer to this interface, call with the service identifier MF_REMOTE_PROXY.
